titles.title: A resolution supporting the mission and goals of National Crime Victims' Rights week in order to increase public awareness of the rights, needs, and concerns of victims and survivors of crime in the United States.

A resolution supporting the mission and goals of National Crime Victims' Rights week in order to increase public awareness of the rights, needs, and concerns of victims and survivors of crime in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the mission and goals of National Crime Victims' Rights Week.
